name: Wikipedia AI Article Search and Verification
description: Verify that searching for 'artificial intelligence' on Wikipedia navigates directly to the correct article and that key elements are present.
requirements:
1. The search functionality works correctly - type in search box and press Enter to submit
2. Pressing Enter navigates directly to the 'Artificial intelligence' article (Wikipedia goes directly to exact matches)
3. The article page loads successfully with the title 'Artificial intelligence'
4. The article contains expected sections like 'History', 'Applications', and 'Ethics'
5. Basic article elements are present (table of contents, images, infobox)

action_instruction.expected_outcome: Wikipedia home page loads and the search input field is visible

steps.description: Type 'artificial intelligence' into the search box

action_instruction.description: Type 'artificial intelligence' into the search box
action_instruction.expected_outcome: The text 'artificial intelligence' appears in the search input field

steps.description: Submit the search by pressing Enter

action_instruction.description: Submit the search by pressing Enter
action_instruction.expected_outcome: Browser navigates directly to the 'Artificial intelligence' article page

steps.description: Verify the article heading is 'Artificial intelligence'

action_instruction.description: Verify the article heading is 'Artificial intelligence'
action_instruction.expected_outcome: Page displays 'Artificial intelligence' as the main heading

steps.description: Verify that the 'History' section is present in the article

action_instruction.description: Verify that the 'History' section is present in the article
action_instruction.expected_outcome: A link to the 'History' section is visible in the table of contents

steps.description: Verify that the 'Applications' section is present in the article

action_instruction.description: Verify that the 'Applications' section is present in the article
action_instruction.expected_outcome: A link to the 'Applications' section is visible in the table of contents

steps.description: Verify that the 'Ethics' section is present in the article

action_instruction.description: Verify that the 'Ethics' section is present in the article
action_instruction.expected_outcome: A link to the 'Ethics' section is visible in the table of contents

steps.description: Verify the table of contents is displayed

action_instruction.description: Verify the table of contents is displayed
action_instruction.expected_outcome: The table of contents is visible below the article title

steps.description: Verify that at least one image is present in the article

action_instruction.description: Verify that at least one image is present in the article
action_instruction.expected_outcome: One or more images are visible within the article content

steps.description: Verify the presence of an infobox in the article

action_instruction.description: Verify the presence of an infobox in the article
action_instruction.expected_outcome: An infobox is visible in the top right area of the article page
